alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 18 at 10:36PM EDT until July 19 at 5:51AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana... White River at Ravenswood. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. White River at Noblesville. .Copious rainfall northeast of Indianapolis has lead to flooding on portions of the White and Mississinewa rivers in central and northeast Indiana. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Mississinewa River banks about one mile east of Ridgeville and in other areas begin to overflow at this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 PM EDT Monday was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 3.9 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
